          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Távolságtartó transzformációk, a tengelyes és középpontos tükrözés</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Distance Tranformations, Axis And Point Reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abstand Tranformations, Mittellinie Und

Et de Point</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Reflexão Da Distância Tranformations, Da

            <string language="x-mt-it">La Riflessione Di Distanza Tranformations, Di 
Asse E Del Punto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αντανάκλαση απόστασης Tranformations, άξονα και 
σημείου</string>

Eje Y De la Punta</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">The distance transformations, axis and point reflection</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">tranformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">distance preserving transformation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-pt">As transformações da distância, a linha 
central e a reflexão do ponto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le trasformazioni di distanza, l'asse e la 
riflessione del punto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μετασχηματισμοί απόστασης, ο άξονας και η

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Las transformaciones de la distancia, el eje y la

          <keyword>
